headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KRAININ, HAROLD L.

snippet: KRAININ--Harold L.,age 88, formerly of Glen Head, NY. Loving husband of Carol. Father of Fred, Rick, David and Dan and ten cherished grandchildren. Proud attorney, entrepreneur and writer. Contributions to Memorial Sloan-Kettering. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KRAININ--Harold L.,age 88, formerly of Glen Head, NY. Loving husband of Carol. Father of Fred, Rick, David and Dan and ten cherished grandchildren. Proud attorney, entrepreneur and writer. Contributions to Memorial Sloan-Kettering. 1/3
